claim: How to Train Your Dragon (film) lost to an American biographical drama film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2010 , Butler voiced the role of Stoick the Vast in the animated action-fantasy film How to Train Your Dragon , a role he later reprised in Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon  (  2010  )  , Gift of the Night Fury  (  2011  )  and How to Train Your Dragon 2  (  2014  )  .
